part.line: We're getting graphical glitches in single user mode!

condition.narration: Ayane was hired.Ayane flings her arms around.
condition.line: Photoshop is giving me kernel panics!

part.line: I just got the blue screen of death — on a Mac.
All of this is the result of malware injected into The Clan by The Group.
We'll just log in to The Clan and fix this right now—
Can't we just have the guys at The Group arrested for cyber-crime?
part.narration: Yuki sighs.

part.name: clan
part.narration: Zoom out.NoLifeQueen, satchmo_omega, and all the Japanese branch's employees pose on a cobbled street. NoLifeQueen looks around. She sees The Palais.
Thirty-foot tall shadow breaks the ground and comes up from the ground and smashes all of the things and flings all the things about. The shockwave deletes all but environment and administrator.
part.line: I can't get a lock on it!
We can't see what it is!
part.narration: NoLifeQueen gets knocked out. Every computer screen goes dark.
part.line: What's going on, did my girl die?
part.narration: The screen flickers. NoLifeQueen comes to. She's in the back of a screeching van.
part.line: What's going on? Did we defeat it?
part.narration: Ganpu's avatar is driving.Keep the camera inside of the vehicle and focused on NoLifeQueen.
part.line: Yuki, get on top of the car.
Get on top of the car.
part.narration: Player climb NoLifeQueen to the top of the van. Since the camera is zoomed in, more intricate control can be had via cursor.NoLifeQueen climbs out of the back of the van to get on the roof. She looks up.
It's The Shadow.From Yuki's position, dolly out far enough to see The Shadow. Note: This is extremely far.
The Shadow picks up the van and singlehandedly crushes it, leaving NoLifeQueen to run next to it on foot. Ganpu is out.
The rest of the administrators run across the rooftops. The Shadow deletes one avatar after another, growing larger as it moves.
And larger.
And larger. Only NoLifeQueen is left. NoLifeQueen is miniscule. Everyone In Real Life cheers her on.
part.line: That boss — kill that boss! Kill it for us!
part.narration: NoLifeQueen gets the boss' hit-point-counter to begin rolling to zero. Everyone joins in for the count down.
Smash. Game Over. Zoom out from game over to Yuki at the computer.Everyone, crowded around Yuki, sighs.
Yuki claws at her hair and writhes about.
Yuki sniffs.
Takuya's face is blank. Shimizu's face is blank. Nozomi's face is blank.
Shimizu and Takuya sigh.
Shimizu runs off.
Takuya and Dan run off. Yuki takes out her phone. Nozomi takes the phone.
part.line: We have to go disconnect the servers.
part.narration: Nozomi and Yuki begin walking to the server room. Nozomi begins to announce into a portable microphone.
part.line: Sega of Japan will no longer provide administrative service nor technical support for The Clan.
We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused you.
Sega of Japan will not refund any customer.
part.narration: The two reach the server room. A sea of towers lay before them, whirring, beating, living.
part.line: We have to unplug all of these.
part.narration: The plugs should be small, so the Player has to look close to unplug them; this should be mundane, repetitive.Nozomi and Yuki scour the server room, unplugging the smoking machines. Yuki gets to the one near the window.
Yuki stops in place.Any player action makes Yuki drop. She drops to the ground, sitting against the tower near the window. Nozomi drops down next to Yuki. Yuki sniffles.
part.line: Nozomi — this game is a monster.
How did all of this start?
part.narration: Camera dolly in extremely close to Yuki's face.Nozomi sighs. She puts her hand on Yuki's lap.
